text: The 1986 Santa Clara Broncos football team represented Santa Clara University during the 1986 NCAA Division II football season. Santa Clara competed in the Western Football Conference (WFC). The Broncos were led by second-year head coach Terry Malley. They played home games at Buck Shaw Stadium in Santa Clara, California. Santa Clara finished the season with a record of four wins and seven losses (4–7, 2–4 WFC). The Broncos were outscored by their opponents 230–334 for the season. ==Schedule== ==Team players in the NFL== No Santa Clara Broncos players were selected in the 1987 NFL Draft.
